attributes.action: act urgently on actions taken by Revenue and Customs on UK Businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Millions of Businesses across the UK are suffering, because of Revenue and Customs brutal attack on legitimate businesses and honest taxpayers. 

Revenue and Customs department are with holding millions of pounds in VAT repayments causing businesses to go insolvent or file for a voluntary liquidation.

HMRC want to prevent revenue loss by targetting the honest taxpayers and underwriting the tax due from the criminal.HMRC cannot pass, if you like, its losses on to innocent taxpayers or businesses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
